articles.title: Tech ETFs Faceoff: Apple Vs Microsoft
articles.content: Apple (AAPL) and Microsoft (MSFT) are racing for the spot of the most valuable company. The iPhone maker currently has a market cap of $3.26 trillion, whereas the software maker boasts $3.29 trillion.
